message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you our premium product. Given its exceptional quality and market demand, I'm confident that it's worth $10000. I'm eager to hear your thoughts on this price point.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I understand that the product is of high quality, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market conditions.

Hi Bob, after considering your perspective and considering the competitive nature of the market, we're willing to adjust our price. We believe that $8500 is a fair price that reflects both the market conditions and the exceptional quality of our product. We're eager to hear your thoughts on this new offer.
